import { forwardRef, useImperativeHandle, useState } from "react" import { Button, Modal } from "semantic-ui-react" import ViewCart from "./ViewCart" import { formatCurrency } from "../../helpers/number-helper" const CheckOutModal = forwardRef((props, ref) => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) useImperativeHandle(ref, () => ({ open() { setOpen(true) }, })) return ( setOpen(false)} onOpen={() => setOpen(true)} open={open} > Check Out <> {props.groups && props.groups.map(group => group.items.map(item => ) )}
Product Quantity Price Total  
     

Total

{formatCurrency(props.totalPrice)}
